title: Sketch Class: Chance Encounters
description:
Multi-session sketch classes offer the chance to draw in the museum's galleries under the guidance of experienced instructors. All materials will be provided. This class takes place over the course of six Thursdays, September 13–October 18.

Discover how letting go of control and inviting the unpredictable into your drawing practice can lead to discovery, beauty, and even humor. Although all levels are welcome, participants in this particular course may find it helpful to have some experience with drawing.

Click here to see all upcoming sketch classes and workshops. For additional information, please call (312) 443-3680 or email museum-programs@artic.edu.

Classes are for people ages 16 and up.

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an email to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible. Please see the museum’s Accessibility page for more information.
